input_claim: Singapore has the highest GDP per capita.

queries_evaluated: highest GDP per capita countries 2024 ranking
Singapore GDP per capita 2024 ranking world
Luxembourg Monaco Liechtenstein GDP per capita 2024 highest
highest GDP per capita country world 2024 nominal PPP
golden_queries: What is Singapore's GDP per capita ranking by nominal and PPP terms
Which country has the highest GDP per capita
What is the latest GDP per capita ranking by country

search_queries: highest GDP per capita countries 2024 ranking
Singapore GDP per capita 2024 ranking world
Luxembourg Monaco Liechtenstein GDP per capita 2024 highest
highest GDP per capita country world 2024 nominal PPP

REASONING: According to the Wikipedia list of countries by GDP (nominal) per capita, Singapore is not ranked as having the highest GDP per capita. The top countries by nominal GDP per capita are Monaco ($256,581), Liechtenstein ($207,973), and Luxembourg ($140,941 for 2025 IMF estimate)
According to the CIA World Factbook data on real GDP per capita (PPP adjusted), Singapore ranks #1 with $132,600 in 2024, followed by Luxembourg at #2 with $128,200, and Monaco at #3 with $115,700
The claim does not specify whether it refers to nominal or PPP-adjusted GDP per capita, which makes a significant difference in rankings
Singapore has the highest GDP per capita when measured in PPP (purchasing power parity) terms according to CIA World Factbook, but not when measured in nominal terms according to multiple sources
Since the claim does not specify the measurement method and Singapore is not the highest in all GDP per capita measurements, the claim as stated is not fully accurate
